transcript.title: Statement, Parliament House
transcript.content:
I’ve seen some reports this morning about a reshuffle. They’re wrong.

Reports of end of year reshuffles are absolutely a dime a dozen.

This is a Government which is totally focused on jobs, economic growth, community safety – not Canberra insider gossip.

What I’m doing now is talking to community leaders about how we can best resettle the 12,000 people displaced from the Syrian warzone that we are going to welcome to our country.

[ends]
